title: MAG 127 - Remains to be Seen Transcript
text:
work it out. 
ELIAS 

The Magnus Archives – 127 – Remains to be Seen 
 
20 
 
Possibly. Then again, you are beset by enemies on all sides, Basira. And, unless 
you expect John to record them into submission, it would seem you are in 
rather dire need of another option. 
BASIRA 
And you just happen to have one. 
ELIAS 
I might have an idea, yes. 
BASIRA 
And what does it cost? 
ELIAS 
Just some of your time, Basira. Just your time. 
[Deep sigh] 
BASIRA 
Okay. Let’s hear it. 
[Tape clicks off] 
[The Magnus Archives Theme – Outro]

The Magnus Archives – 127 – Remains to be Seen 
 
21 
 
Today’s episode was written by Jonathan Sims and directed by Alexander J 
Newall. 
It featured: Jonathan Sims as the Archivist, Frank Voss as Basira Hussain, and 
Ben Meredith as Elias Bouchard.
